There was an older experiment with tab previews, see <http://www.favbrowser.com/how-to-enable-firefox-3-6-tab-preview/> for instructions. It's however to slow to be used (since it shows many tabs), it's not useful if you have dozens of tabs open and you can't use it to organize your tabs in groups.

That's why it more or less replaced by panorama (aka tab candy). It's currently on ctrl-shift-E, but many people place the icon in the toolbar or even in the titlebar.
